item.title: US-75 South/MN-30 East - Pipestone
item.description: US-75 South/MN-30 East - Pipestone. The Highway 75 King of Trails Scenic Byway marker is also posted on this sign assembly.

item.title: US-75 South/MN-30 West at US-75/MN-30 Split
item.description: US-75 South/MN-30 West at US-75/MN-30 split in Pipestone.

item.title: US-75 South/MN-30 East Approaching US-75/MN-30 Split
item.description: US-75 South/MN-30 East approaching US-75/MN-30 split in Pipestone. Use US-75 South for Luverne; MN-30 East for Slayton.

item.title: MN-30 East/US-75 South Approaching MN-30/US-75 Split
item.description: MN-30 East/US-75 South approaching MN-30/US-75 Split in Pipestone. Use left lane for MN-30 East; right lane for US-75 South.

item.title: MN-30 East/MN-23 North at US-75
item.description: MN-30 East/MN-23 North at US-75 in Pipestone. Turn left for US-75 North/MN-23 North. Continue straight for MN-30 East/US-75 South. US-75 South joins MN-30 East through Pipestone.

item.title: MN-30 East/MN-23 North Approaching US-75/MN-23 North
item.description: MN-30 East/MN-23 North approaching US-75/MN-23 North in Pipestone. Use US-75/MN-23 North for Marshall and Lake Benton. Use US-75 South/MN-30 East for Slayton and Luverne. US-75 South joins MN-30 East through Pipestone.

item.title: MN-23 North at MN-30
item.description: MN-23 North at MN-30 in Pipestone. MN-23 north joins MN-30 east through Pipestone.

item.title: MN-30 East Approaching MN-23
item.description: MN-30 East Approaching MN-23 South. MN-23 joins MN-30 through Pipestone.

item.title: MN-30 East - Pipestone
item.description: Entering Pipestone on MN-30 east. Pipestone is the count seat of Pipestone County.

item.title: MN-30 East - Pipestone County
item.description: MN-30 East - Pipestone County. At the South Dakota-Minnesota State Line.

item.title: MN-30 East - Pipestone County
item.description: MN-30 East - Pipestone County. At the South Dakota-Minnesota State Line.
